infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Health Coach uses the camera to analyze your meals.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Health Coach accesses your photos to analyze food images.

plugins.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Health Coach Doug reads your health data (weight, steps, workouts, heart rate) to provide personalized coaching and track your progress.
plugins.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Health Coach Doug can save workout data back to Apple Health to keep all your health records in sync.
